comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to Billboard Apr 5, 1947 books.google.com/books?id=PQwEAAAAMBAJ&pg=PT36&dq... Dixon's changed its name from Dixon's to Freddy Lamb's 18 Club. Opening under the new name on April 5, 1947, it would feature Charlie Drew, Gaye Dixon and dancing to the Vivien Gary [sic] Trio. Maybe the new name did not stick!!
